body.name: Noctua NH-L9a-AM4 chromax.Black, Low-Profile CPU Cooler for AMD AM4 (Black)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 20 mins
features: Proven premium heatsink (more than 50 awards and recommendations from international hardware websites), now available in an all-black design that goes great with many colour schemes and RGB LEDs
Only 37mm height allows it to fit ultra-compact HTPC and Small Form Factor (SFF) cases, tailored footprint guarantees 100% RAM and PCIe compatibility on all ITX, Micro-ATX and ATX AM4 motherboards
Renowned, award-winning NF-A9x14 slim 92mm fan with Low-Noise Adaptor and PWM for automatic speed control: Full cooling performance under load, whisper quiet at idle!
Includes high-end NT-H1 thermal paste and SecuFirm2 mounting system for easy installation on AMD Ryzen CPUs and APUs
Renowned Noctua quality backed up by 6-year manufacturer’s warranty, deluxe choice for AMD Ryzen CPUs & APUs with moderate heat load (e.g. 5600, 4750G, 4650G, 4600G, see compatibility list)
body.description: Cooler Specifications Please Note: The NH-L9a-AM4 is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in small form factor cases and HTPC environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and or CPUs that create high heat loads. Scope of delivery NF-A9x14 HS-PWM chromax.black premium fanNA-RC7 Low-Noise Adaptor (L.N.A)NT-H1 high-grade thermal compoundBlack SecuFirm2 AM4 mounting kitBlack screws for 92x92x25mm fansMetal Case-Badge

productInformation.name: Material
productInformation.value: Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins), soldered joints & nickel plating

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 1,488 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The NH-L9a-AM4 chromax.black is an all-black version of Noctua’s award-winning NH-L9a-AM4 low-profile quiet CPU cooler for AMD Ryzen based HTPCs and Small Form Factor (SFF) builds. Thanks to the same proven heatsink design and NF-A9x14 PWM fan, it stays true to the NH-L9a-AM4’s successful formula of fusing a height of only 37mm with strong performance and excellent quietness of operation, as well as 100% RAM and PCIe compatibility. At the same time, the chromax.black version with its black fan and black coated heatsink combines these assets with a sleek stealth look. Topped off with the renowned SecuFirm2 low-profile mounting system for AMD AM4 and Noctua’s enthusiast-grade NT-H1 thermal compound, the NH-L9a-AM4 chromax.black is a premium choice for customers who seek an ultra-compact heatsink that looks just as great as it cools.

37mm low profile Due to the slim 23mm heatsink and the NF-A9x14 low profile fan that measures only 14mm in thickness, the NH-L9 stands a mere 37mm tall, which makes it ideal for use in compact HTPCs or Small Form Factor cases that offer minimum clearance for CPU coolers. 100% RAM compatibility The NH-L9a-AM4 has a compact footprint that fully complies with the socket keep-out zones specified by AMD. This means that neither the heatsink nor the fan overhang the RAM, so the cooler provides easy access to the slots and is fully compatible with tall memory modules. 100% compatibility with PCIe cards on mini-ITX Some AMD-based mini-ITX motherboards have the PCIe slot located close to the CPU socket zone. While larger coolers that exceed this zone may block the PCIe slot, the compact-sized NH-L9a-AM4 provides full compatibility with PCIe cards. Custom-designed SecuFirm2 mounting for AM4 The NH-L9a-AM4 comes with a custom-designed SecuFirm2 mounting system for the AM4 socket of AMD’s Ryzen platform. Allowing the heatsink to be fixed from the back of the motherboard, it makes installation easier than ever, all while maintaining the trusted SecuFirm2 quality.

Measurements Height (without fan): 23 mm Width (without fan): 114 mm Depth (without fan): 92 mm Height (with fan): 37 mm Width (with fan): 114 mm Depth (with fan): 92 mm Weight (without fan): 390 g Weight (with fan): 465 g Materials Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins), soldered joints & nickel plating Cooler Specifications Please Note: The NH-L9a-AM4 is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in small form factor cases and HTPC environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and or CPUs that create high heat loads. Scope of delivery NF-A9x14 HS-PWM chromax.black premium fanNA-RC7 Low-Noise Adaptor (L.N.A)NT-H1 high-grade thermal compoundBlack SecuFirm2 AM4 mounting kitBlack screws for 92x92x25mm fansMetal Case-Badge

chromax.black design The NH-L9a-AM4 chromax.black is black from head to toe: Featuring a black coated heatsink, a black fan with black anti-vibration-pads, black fan screws and black mounting parts, it’s right at home in all-black builds and easy to integrate with other colour schemes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very low profile
reviews.reviewText: Used this on a mini ITX motherboard in a TINY computer case. This cooler solved all the issues. It does not interfere with full height RAM, is very compact while being very quiet and provides good cooling. It is a down draft cooler that directs air towards the motherboard, which in my circumstance, is an extra benefit because there is no other fan in the case. The CPU is a Ryzen 3 3200G processor with 4 cores. It is not being maxed out at all. The online reviews suggest that it can handle a much higher thermal load than what I’m subjecting it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cooler but be realistic
reviews.reviewText: Very low profile. I had it installed on a 5600x in a fractual terra case and it kept it very cool. Install was very easy and didn't interfere with the ram sticks at all.I received a 5600x3d for Christmas and challenged this cooler on keeping it cool. I seen it go to 90 degrees c pretty quickly but I did expect the cooler to struggle with this cpu. I installed another noctua cooler that was compatible with the fractual terra and seen Temps that were more acceptable. I'm gonna keep this cooler as I will build another computer in another fractual terra for my wife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean silent and effective
reviews.reviewText: Got this one because I wanted a low profile cooler for purely aesthetic reasons and this one is an incredible deal. Installed this on my MSI B550 (I saw a review that said it lacked parts needed to fit but it seems it’s all pre packaged now) able to overclock my Ryzen 5000 series CPU and the temps are low. Very silent and was easy to install. Everything from product to packaging is incredible. My first time purchasing a noctua product and it really impressed me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is why Noctua keeps earning my business.
reviews.reviewText: First off, this is a fantastic cooler for lower wattage chips, perfect for my 5600x. Love the black aesthetic and cooling performance. Low noise level, quality heat sink, and modular fan if you want to swap fans. The only issue that I find with this cooler, like many others, is the mounting hardware. Not the hardest one I've had to deal with, but it could be a easier, especially if you have to reseat the cooler or swap the cpu. I took several YouTubers advice and installed it upside down. While a minor inconvenience, it still didn't deter me from giving this product 5 stars. What went above and beyond for me was the absolutely excellent presentation and packaging of the product. It shows what a quality company Noctua is and you know what you are getting is premium grade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cooler for 65W CPU
reviews.reviewText: Great choice for a low profile cooler. Quiet as CPU coolers go.Install is harder than most CPU coolers because you have to remove the existing CPU heatsink mounts. This isn't terribly difficult or unusual for super low profile coolers like this. Just an fyi.A lot less metal than a taller cooler. My 65W CPU gets warm but never too hot. Probably not sufficient for 100W+ use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super sleek and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cooler to replace my AIO that was in my SFF build. It is quiet but I do think my CPU runs a bit hotter now, but not a lot. I bought it to match the rest of my noctua fans. I recommend this fan to anyone with a low profile build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Effective
reviews.reviewText: I was setting up an ITX system as a secondary in one of my phanteks computer cases, and needed a cooler that could fit in a tight space and still provide adequate cooling for the ITX' processor. Most 120mm AIOs didn't have the tube length I needed, tower coolers were too tall, and a lot of 'low profile' coolers conflicted with the RAM slots.This ended up being the best option for my secondary system, and does an excellent job keeping it cool. Mounting is kind of tricky since you have to flip the motherboard upside down and install it that way, but it wasn't too difficult. And what I liked most was being able to swap out the fan for something with a little bit of color as they included screws for both low-profile fans like the one included, as well as screws for thicker fans such as a Scythe RGB fan I had purchased to go along with the cooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cooler but
reviews.reviewText: Great cooler from noctua easy to install and setup. Like the small profile design only issue I have is I’m running a AMD Ryzen 5800x with a Zotac 3050 on a gigabyte a520i motherboard. Case is a itx cooler master nr200 16gb ram 3600mhz, 650 watt power supply. Only problem I’m having is the Cooler can’t keep the CPU under 70c at Home Screen. Under load running ready or not at load screen it got as high as 90c. Also did a test with left for dead 2 and got similar results. So if you are planning on using a 5800x with this cooler. I would not recommend using this one. I’m probably going to look for a beefy water cooler.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as expected. Looks really stealthy.
reviews.reviewText: Running this in my 5600x mini itx build in a lian li a4-h20. Keeps temperatures under 80C. Pretty quiet. Installation was easy. But the height clearance is super close to the capacitors next to the socket (gigabyte b550i pro). It has <1mm clearance. No issues though (yet). Would highly recommend if you're looking for something in a small build, high quality, and looks super stealthy.

Tuvo que aplicar por una devolución porque no me fue posible ensamblar el disipador con mi tarjeta madre (MSI B550 Gaming Plus). A pesar de eso se ve muy bien el disipador y te incluyen una calcomanía metálica.
Joue très bien son rôle de refroidissement et en plus super silencieux, pour l'installation nécessite le démontage de la CM pour utiliser le support fourni .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: the cooler looks very good and is very quiet when running, but struggles a lot to keep my ryzen 5 5600x cool when gaming. and therefore sometimes has to run the fan at 2000 rpm to stay below 80 degrees

La calidad de construcción es simplemente magnífica. Lo compré para montar en un Asrock X300 y estoy muy contento, el nivel de ruido es casi imperceptible, y la temperatura de trabajo es menor que con el ventilador que trae de serie el barebone. Compra totalmente recomendable.
